LightningComponentBundle.description: Pass in a collection of records with start datetimes. This component provides a date picker for records

propertyType.name: T
propertyType.label: Record Type
propertyType.description: Select the SObject type for the records being passed into the picker

property.name: prefillRecords
property.label: 1: Records
property.description: Pass in a collection of records that include a Datetime

property.name: startDateTimeFieldName
property.label: 2: Datetime | FieldApiName
property.description: This must be a FieldApiName for a DateTime field on the related object. The values within this field are used to group records into their date and time selectors

property.name: selectorLabelFieldName
property.label: 3: Selector Label | FieldApiName
property.description: This must be a FieldApiName on the related object. This value is used as the label for the time selectors. Note: This can be a formula field

property.name: maxSelection
property.label: 4: Maximum Selection
property.description: This defines the maximum number of records that a User can select within the picker

property.name: label
property.label: 5: Label
property.description: Provide a label for the Date and Time Picker

property.name: disabledFieldName
property.label: 7: Disabled | FieldApiName
property.description: Pass in the FieldApiName of a boolean field. When true the record cannot be selected.

property.name: themeFieldName
property.label: 8: Theme | FieldApiName
property.description: Pass in the FieldApiName of a string field that contains a custom CSS class name.

property.name: hideCalendarOnSelection
property.label: Hide Calendar on Selection
property.description: After a date is selected calendar is hidden from view

property.name: selectedRecords
property.label: Selected Record(s) Collection
property.description: Returns a collection of selected records

property.name: selectedRecordIds
property.label: Selected Id(s) Collection
property.description: Returns a collection of selected record Ids

property.name: selectedRecordDates
property.label: Selected DateTime(s) Collection
property.description: Returns a collection of selected datetime values
